subject: Cycling, Road
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Bradley Wiggins, the reigning champion of the Tour de France, has brought his star power to the Giro d'Italia, a three-week, 21-stage Grand Tour that starts this weekend in Naples.
snippet: Bradley Wiggins, the reigning champion of the Tour de France, has brought his star power to the Giro d'Italia, a three-week, 21-stage Grand Tour that starts this weekend in Naples.
